name: Bean Assassin (Prototype)
description:
Bean Assassin is a prototype game I have been working on for about a month now, I decided to release a 5 minute demo to showcase what I have made so far and to receive feedback so I can perfect the most basic features. I hope to release weekly updates for this game so please check in regularly! 

once you have played the demo please complete this microsoft form so I can take the feedback to make the next update even better!

- https://forms.office.com/r/rvMjXJ3aiG
